title.native: ラブライブ！サンシャイン!! The School Idol Movie Over the Rainbow
title.romaji: Love Live! Sunshine!! The School Idol Movie: Over the Rainbow
title.english: Love Live! Sunshine!! The School Idol Movie: Over the Rainbow

description:
In the film's story, Uranohoshi Girls' High School's idol group Aqours has won the final Love Live! contest. While preparing to enroll at a new school, the first- and second-year students encounter unexpected trouble. Also, after heading for a graduation trip, the third-year students go missing. As they are separated, the Aqours members appreciate the weight of their togetherness for the first time. In order to move forward, they must decide how to react to their new situations.

(Source: Official Website)

tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

node.description:
__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

Sakurako’s work is based on her own experiences, with [Sister Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38414/) coming from having a brother, [Strawberry Panic!](https://anilist.co/manga/34974/) coming from attending an all-girls school, and [Baby Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38676/) from having a lot of cousins.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erikafmenezes) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/erikafmenezes) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@QuemDublaOficial)

Erika Fernandes Menezes is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, dubbing director, and YouTuber.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Lily Collins, Dakota Fanning, Zoey Deutch, Angourie Rice, Alexis Knapp, Brie Larson, Debby Ryan, Brianne Tju, Brianna Hildebrand, Halston Sage, Jeon Yeo-Bin, Lena Dunham, Rosa Salazar, Sarah Gadon, Jessica Henwick and Keke Palmer (Most of the productions)
